channel.title: Server starting error
channel.description: i get this error when starting my 317 server [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code] and here is my path [code]@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code] and it worked few hrs ago and doesnt work now

item.title: Server starting error

item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

i get this error when starting my 317 server

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
and here is my path

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause and it worked few hrs ago and doesnt work now
